meanings.sent1: She kept misdialling the number and couldn't reach her friend.
meanings.sent2: I always end up misdialling when I try to call my grandma.
meanings.sent3: After misdialling for the third time, she realized she was dialing the wrong area code.
meanings.sent4: His fingers seemed to have a mind of their own, constantly misdialling the digits on the phone.
meanings.sent5: The constant misdialling created a frustrating pattern of failed connections.

meanings.definition: The act of making an error while dialing a phone number.
meanings.sent1: Her repeated misdialling of the number led to missed appointments.
meanings.sent2: The misdialling of emergency numbers can delay help in urgent situations.
meanings.sent3: The comedic character in the movie was known for his hilarious misdialling antics.
meanings.sent4: The misdialling of numbers in the dark room felt like a game of chance.
meanings.sent5: The constant misdialling became a source of frustration for the forgetful old man.
